name: Garuda Magic
summary: You are descended from the wondrous garudas, and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess.
description:
You are descended from the wondrous garudas, and their keen senses manifest in your magical prowess. You can cast blur and see invisibility each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.Traits

Aasimar: A creature with this trait has the aasimar versatile heritage. Aasimars are planar scions descended from celestial beings. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by aasimars.
